subject: Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Belmont Stakes
Women and Girls
lead_paragraph: Rosie Napravnik rides Pants on Fire and Kathy Ritvo trains Mucho Macho Man, but Tammy Fox has also been important, advising Shackleford’s trainer, Dale Romans.
snippet: Rosie Napravnik rides Pants on Fire and Kathy Ritvo trains Mucho Macho Man, but Tammy Fox has also been important, advising Shackleford’s trainer, Dale Romans.
